ygData.subject: Re: Best 1hs (Spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: actually one of the best 1hs weapons there is just started appearing on mith marr, the crystalline sword dmg11 del38.  it is pending lore so you may only use
ygData.messageBody:
actually one of the best 1hs weapons there is just started appearing on mith
marr, the crystalline sword dmg11 del38. it is pending lore so you may only
use one, but it really rocks. hopefully i can get one soon but i do not know
where it comes from as of yet, the rumor is permafrost, if anyone knows tell
us! =)

as far as the staff of writhing, on the kobold noble in solusek B. the
demon claw, on the avatar of fear in cazic-thule. the black enamelled mace
in lower guk, not sure on what i have not gotten one yet. unfortunately you
can use staff or claw, but not both, each requires to be in primary hand.
and consequently you can not duel wield them, mor many other weps that are
now pending lore.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 43 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
